 Just in time for 30-year stage anniversary of the cult group BAD BOYS BLUE appears the new Best Of (Reloaded) album with a new sound.
 "30" provides a comprehensive overview of the work of the band - a total of 4 new and 4 so far unreleased songs,
 and more of the original 24-track studio tapes remixed and arranged that in every CD collection belong.
 On CD 1, there are 11 completely reshuffled and arranged hit singles (including You're A Woman, Pretty Young Girl, Come Back And Stay, Lady In Black, How I Need You ...) and 3 NEW HIT MIXES - all mixed and mastered new.
 CD2 holds among other hits previously unreleased remixes and rare archival material ready.
 In addition, there is the brand new "Anniversary Medley 2015" and as a special bonus, the long-lost instrumental of "Jungle In My Heart".
 "30" is a powerful music package with the biggest hits in the new sound
